posts.content:
Oovoo plans to bring their 120 million users to VR, exclusive report
Oovoo, one of the leading social media companies in the world, is getting into the VR space,
according to JP Nauseef the companyâ€™s managing director. In an exclusive interview with Upload, Nauseef and CMO
Chris Wire revealed the company has plans to integrate its platform with Oculus VR.
